resources.string: First, choose a story from the drop-down menu. The required word type will then be displayed, think of such a word and type in the text field. Press OK to submit a word. Continue doing this until no more words are required, and press Go!
Fred is great at making stories. Give him a few words, and see what he can come up with! Come on now, don\'t be shy!
Enter a few words to make your own story!
